hero.title: Enjoy Plant-
hero.description: At Plantique Organics, we craft premium plant-based products for the modern lifestyle. From artisanal milk powders to wellness blends - experience pure nutrition, pure taste.

about.title: A Taste of
about.subtitle: Vegan Paradise
about.description1: At Plantique Organics, we create clean, premium plant-based products for the discerning modern lifestyle. From artisanal oat, soya, and coconut milk powders to wellness blends like ceremonial matcha and traditional chai latte.
about.description2: We believe in simple ingredients, sustainable choices, and pure nutrition â€” because what's good for you should also be extraordinary for the planet.

products.title: Our Premium Collection
products.description: Discover your new favorite plant-based treat. Each product is meticulously crafted with premium ingredients for exceptional taste and uncompromising nutrition.

oatMilk.name: Oat Milk Powder
oatMilk.description: A creamy, dairy-free alternative made from whole oats. Perfect for smoothies, coffee, and baking.

soyaMilk.name: Soya Milk Powder
soyaMilk.description: Plant-based protein in every scoop. Smooth, nutritious, and lactose-free.

coconutMilk.name: Coconut Milk Powder
coconutMilk.description: Naturally sweet and rich, with the goodness of real coconuts. Great for curries and desserts.

almondMilk.name: Almond Milk Powder
almondMilk.description: Rich and creamy almond milk powder with natural sweetness and heart-healthy nutrients.

matcha.name: Matcha Powder
matcha.description: Premium ceremonial grade matcha blend loaded with antioxidants for energy and focus.

chaiLatte.name: Chai Latte Powder
chaiLatte.description: A warm, spiced vegan latte made with traditional Indian chai flavors. Comfort in a cup.

lionsMane.name: Lion's Mane Latte Powder
lionsMane.description: Premium adaptogenic mushroom blend for cognitive support and brain health enhancement.

features.title: Why Choose Plantique?
features.description: We're committed to bringing you the purest plant-based nutrition with uncompromising quality, exceptional taste, and sustainable practices.

plantBased.title: 100% Plant-Based
plantBased.description: All our products are completely vegan, cruelty-free, and made from the finest plant ingredients.

cleanLabel.title: Clean Label Promise
cleanLabel.description: No artificial additives, preservatives, or hidden ingredients. Just pure, natural goodness.

madeInIndia.title: Made in India
madeInIndia.description: Proudly crafted with love using locally sourced ingredients from trusted Indian farmers.

premiumQuality.title: Premium Quality
premiumQuality.description: Every product is carefully crafted to deliver exceptional taste and nutritional value.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Premium Plant-Based Journey?
cta.description: Join thousands of conscious consumers who have discovered the perfect blend of health, sustainability, and exceptional taste. Experience the Plantique difference.
